overview: In the neighborhood of Los Angeles, known for drugs, violence and corruption, a wage for war is about to get green lighted. Two brothers are forced to confront faith, loyalty, passion and a touch of vengeance- when forced to collide where all's salvation is at stake. .  Drama - David Fernandez, Jolane Lentz, Nick Hernandez, Goya Robles, Mauricio Mendoza
title: A Gangster's World
